subject: Snowboarding
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Two years after Kevin Pearce sustained a traumatic brain injury, he will glide down a slope in Breckenridge as a way to thank his friends and fans for their support.
snippet: Two years after Kevin Pearce sustained a traumatic brain injury, he will glide down a slope in Breckenridge as a way to thank his friends and fans for their support.
